      Amadeus the Wizard, Pontius the Knight,  and Zoya  the  Thief  have
      slowly come to the conclusion that having their  lives commandeered
      by  a  powerful  magical  artifact  is  not a  desirable  state  of
      existence on a permanent  basis. The  heroes try  to  return  their
      extraordinary  gifts to  the Artifact  called Trine,  and  so  they
      meddle with powers beyond their understanding.
